title: Google at the big game
description: At the big game, Google will demonstrate how our products and technologies help individuals and businesses.
excerpt: At the big game, Google will demonstrate how our products and technologies help individuals and businesses.
text: Jan 30, 2025 · 3 articles 30 Jan, 2025articles 3 Jan 30, 2025 3 articles 30 Jan, 2025 articles 3 As the Eagles take on the Chiefs at the big game, we'll be demonstrating how our products and technologies help people and businesses. A first-of-its-kind campaign features 50 small businesses in local ads across the U.S., sharing how technology and AI are transforming their work. YouTube returns with AdBlitz, creator content and in-person fan events and experiences that will be live streamed only on YouTube. And our national ad continues our tradition of highlighting how our technology can help make a real difference in people’s lives. Find out more below.
html:

articles 3

Jan 30, 2025 3 articles 30 Jan, 2025

articles 3

As the Eagles take on the Chiefs at the big game, we'll be demonstrating how our products and technologies help people and businesses. A first-of-its-kind campaign features 50 small businesses in local ads across the U.S., sharing how technology and AI are transforming their work. YouTube returns with AdBlitz, creator content and in-person fan events and experiences that will be live streamed only on YouTube. And our national ad continues our tradition of highlighting how our technology can help make a real difference in people’s lives. Find out more below.
